name: Sergey Sosnovsky
content: Sergey Sosnovsky: Academic Webpage Sergey Sosnovsky Home Research Teaching Publications Links Contact details: E-mail: s.a.sosnovsky@uu.nl Phone: +31 (30) 253 1455 Fax: +31 (30) 253 2804 Post: Princetonplein 5, 3584 CC, Utrecht, the Netherlands Office: BBG-564, Department of Information and Computing Sciences, Faculty of Science, Utrecht University Welcome to My Academic Webpage I am an Assistant Professor of Software Technology for Learning and Teaching at the Department of Information and Computing Sciences (Utrecht University). My research interests lie at the crossroads of Technology-Enhanced Learning, Adaptive Systems and New Web Technologies. I hold a PhD degree in Information Sciences from University of Pittsburgh (Pittsburgh, PA, USA) and an MSc-level Dimploma in Information Systems from Kazan State Technological University (Kazan, Russia). https://orcid.org/0000-0001-8023-1770 Follow @SergeySosnovsky Â© Sergey Sosnovsky | Design: Coffeelike by nodethirtythree + Templated.org | Sponsor: Business Website Templates
